title: 1 Difference between authorization and authentication ?
desc: authentication and authorization may sound alike, but each plays a different role in securing systems and data.Authentication and authorization are two vital information security processes that administrators use to protect systems and information. Authentication verifies the identity of a user or service, and authorization determines their access rights.

title: 2 Why are you using firebase? What other options do you have to implement authentication?
desc: Google Firebase offers many features that pitch it as the go-to backend development tool for web and mobile apps. It reduces development workload and time. And it's a perfect prototyping tool. Firebase is simple, lightweight, friendly, and industrially recognized.We use custom hook like react-firebase-hook to implement firebase authentication,

title: 3 What other services does firebase provide other than authentication ?
desc: Google Firebase uses dedicated cloud-based NoSQL databases, Firestore, and a real-time database, to store information.  You can also host your web app easily on Firebase. Firebase ML comes in handy if you have a machine learning project to deploy along with your app.
